dc.title: USAccess FedIDCard HSPD-12 Home
dc.description: Because security is paramount in today's world, the U.S. government issued the Homeland Security Presidential Directive-12 (HSPD-12) to set policy for a common reliable identification standard for federal employees and contractors, requiring all agencies to put a smart-card program in place by October 2006.
